name: wespo
short_description: This program is an unofficial tool for the game wesnoth. It allows you to easily create an empty .po file for your add-on (skele.po) that can be used as a source for your add-on translations. Unlike the official tool WesCamp, you will run wespo on your local PC and you will obtain immediately your .po file. And it allows you to customize the output information related to a string, if you need it. See Advanced Usage
summary: An unofficial tool to create a .po file for your wesnoth add-on
